entry.title: New release for Bitwarden: Version 2025.6.1
entry.content: • This is the same release as 2025.6.0, but we have reverted https://github.com/bitwarden/server/pull/5652

entry.title: New release for Bitwarden: Version 2025.6.2
entry.content:
• Removed support for users with no userkey
  • Removed feature flags
  • Dependency updates, small enhancements, and bug-fixes

Thank you! üíô A big shout-out to the following community members for their contributions!

Henr1k80 - Avoid multiple lookups in dictionaries benbryant0 - Enable NRT for some Core project files
